2 #include <tf/tf.h>
3 #include <tf2/LinearMath/Quaternion.h>
4 #include <tf2_ros/transform_broadcaster.h>
5 #include <geometry_msgs/TransformStamped.h>
6 #include <std_msgs/Float64.h>

8 #include <turtlesim/Pose.h>

10 float angle=0.0;
11 void poseCallback(std_msgs::Float64 msg){
12  angle=msg.data;
13 }
14 
15 int main(int argc, char** argv){
16  ros::init(argc, argv, "base_movement_dummie");
17  ros::NodeHandle nh;
18  ros::Subscriber sub = nh.subscribe("test_float", 10, &poseCallback);
19  static tf2_ros::TransformBroadcaster br;
20  ros::Rate rate(500);
21 
22  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped transformStamped;
23  std::string tf_prefix;
24  ros::NodeHandle("~").getParam("tf_prefix",tf_prefix);
25  while(ros::ok())
26  {
27  tf2::Quaternion q;
28  q.setRPY(0, 0, angle);
29  transformStamped.header.frame_id=tf::resolve(tf_prefix,"odom");
30  transformStamped.header.stamp=ros::Time::now();
31  transformStamped.child_frame_id=tf::resolve(tf_prefix,"base_link");
32  transformStamped.transform.translation.x=1.0;
33  transformStamped.transform.translation.y=1.0;
34  transformStamped.transform.translation.z=0.0;
35  transformStamped.transform.rotation.x = q.x();
36  transformStamped.transform.rotation.y = q.y();
37  transformStamped.transform.rotation.z = q.z();
38  transformStamped.transform.rotation.w = q.w();
39  br.sendTransform(transformStamped);
40  rate.sleep();
41  ros::spinOnce();
42  }
43  return 0;
44 };
